overview: In a dialogue with Happy Traum, Norman Blake teaches his guitar techniques.  10 tunes are covered:  "Coming Down From Rising Fawn," "Caperton Ferry," "Uncle Joe" ("Miss McLeod's Reel"), "Old Virginia Reel," "Coleman's March," "New Century Hornpipe" and "Jimmy in the Swamp." Songs: "Church Street Blues," "Give Me Back My Fifteen Cents" and "Hobo's Last Ride."
title: Norman Blake's Guitar Techniques - DVD 2
